img_summary: The image depicts the "Evil Repelling Medicament," an uncommon item from the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*. This item significantly increases damage reduction for a long duration when used. It can be obtained through various means, including purchasing its formula from the Shrine store, finding it in chests, looting enemy corpses, or receiving it as a reward from Xu Dog after defeating Lang-Li-Guhh-Baw. The item requires 1 Licorice to craft.
